Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); PTOLEMAIC PERIOD ?; GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Name: Lion
Description: This statuette in limestone probably dating from the Late Period depicts a sitting lion. It could be that the piece, which  was part of the former collection of M.Stoclet, comes from Edfu. The excavations carried out at this site in 1921-1922 have yielded several similar statuettes.
